name: falco-gke-audit-bridge
description: Send GKE audit events to falco
author: S. Hermans <s.hermans@codeonline.io>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && cp package.json README.md dist && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && cp package.json README.md dist && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json -w
scripts.test: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && cp package.json README.md dist && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter=lcovonly mocha "./dist/**/*.spec.js"
